org.apache.juneau.transforms

Class InputStreamSwap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.transform.PojoSwap<T,String>
      • org.apache.juneau.transform.StringSwap<InputStream>
        • org.apache.juneau.transforms.InputStreamSwap
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputStreamSwap.Base64, InputStreamSwap.Hex, InputStreamSwap.SpacedHex

    public abstract class InputStreamSwap
extends StringSwap<InputStream>
    Transforms InputStreams to Strings.

      Converts InputStreams to spaced-hex encoding.
